data.text:
Many are interested in knowing about Mark Kelly‘s personal life, particularly the inspiring story of his wife. People want to know more about his relationship with Gabby Giffords and her background. So, let’s explore the details of Mark Kelly’s life and his extraordinary journey with Gabby Giffords.

Here’s everything you need to know about Mark Kelly, including insights into his relationship with Gabby Giffords, as well as her age and career.

Who is Mark Kelly’s wife in 2024?

Senator Mark Kelly’s wife in 2024 is Gabby Giffords.

Giffords, a former U.S. Representative, is known for her remarkable resilience following a traumatic brain injury from a shooting in 2011, according to People.

What is Gabby Giffords’ age?

Gabby Giffords was born on June 8, 1970, making her 54 years old in 2024.

Gabrielle Giffords was born and raised in Tucson, Arizona. She attended University High School in Tucson and graduated from Scripps College with a Bachelor’s degree in Sociology and Latin American History. She then earned a Master’s degree in Regional Planning from Cornell University.

Mark Kelly and Gabby Giffords’ relationship timeline

Mark Kelly and Gabby Giffords met in 2003 during a young leaders forum in China organized by the National Committee on U.S.-China Relations. At the time, Giffords was an Arizona state senator, and Kelly was a NASA astronaut. They began dating in November 2004 and married on November 10, 2007.

According to Business Insider, their relationship faced a significant challenge on January 8, 2011, when Gabby was shot in the head at a Congress event in Tucson. Kelly rushed to her side and supported her during her recovery.

In an interview with ABC, Kelly mentioned, “If I hold her hand, she’ll play with my wedding ring. She’ll move it up and down my finger. She’ll take it off… She’ll put it on her own finger. She’ll move it to her thumb. And then she can put it back on my finger.”

Kelly went on a space mission on May 16, 2011, commanding a mission to deliver the Alpha Magnetic Spectrometer to the ISS. On January 30, 2013, Kelly supported Giffords as she testified before the Senate Judiciary Committee on gun violence. They founded the political action committee Americans for Responsible Solutions in 2013 to advocate for stricter gun laws. The couple toured nationwide, urging lawmakers to address gun violence.

On December 2, 2020, Gabby Giffords proudly held the Bible for Mark Kelly’s swearing-in ceremony as Arizona Senator, celebrating their journey together, as per CBS News. On November 8, 2022, Giffords joined Kelly to celebrate his re-election victory in the midterms, marking another milestone in their resilient partnership.
